dc_description_s: Relief shown by hachures and spot heights.; Also shows steamer routes, railways, canals, and submarine cables.; On cover: "Philips' authentic maps."; Series statement and publisher information from panel, pasted on verso.; Lower left corner: "George Philip & Son, Ltd."; Lower right corner: "The London Geographical Institute."; Includes inset maps of the environs of Madrid and the Canary Islands.|50 x 60 centimeters|Scale 1:2,140,000; 34 miles to 1 inch|General Map Collection
